alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 02 at 1:34AM MST until December 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM MST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SUNDAY TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first High Wind Warning, west wind gusts up to 60 mph expected Saturday night, with decreasing winds late Saturday night and Sunday. For the second High Wind Warning, west wind gusts up to 70 mph expected Sunday night into Monday morning. * WHERE...Judith Gap, Southern Wheatland, Melville Foothills, and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...For the first High Wind Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 4 AM MST Sunday. For the second High Wind Warning, from 6 PM Sunday to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber to Harlowton to Judith Gap. Mild and dry conditions could cause quick fire spread. Use caution with any burning activities.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
